      • newUser

        public org.activiti.engine.identity.User newUser(String userId)
        Creates a new user. The user is transient and must be saved using saveUser(org.activiti.engine.identity.User).
        Specified by:
        newUser in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService
        Parameters:
        userId - id for the new user, cannot be null.

      • saveUser

        public void saveUser(org.activiti.engine.identity.User user)
        Saves the user. If the user already existed, the user is updated.
        Specified by:
        saveUser in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService
        Parameters:
        user - user to save, cannot be null.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - when a user with the same name already exists.

      • createUserQuery

        public org.activiti.engine.identity.UserQuery createUserQuery()
        Creates a UserQuery that allows to programmatically query the users.
        Specified by:
        createUserQuery in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(String userId)
        Specified by:
        deleteUser in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService
        Parameters:
        userId - id of user to delete, cannot be null. When an id is passed for a not existing user, this operation is ignored.

      • newGroup

        public org.activiti.engine.identity.Group newGroup(String groupId)
        Creates a new group. The group is transient and must be saved using saveGroup(org.activiti.engine.identity.Group).
        Specified by:
        newGroup in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService
        Parameters:
        groupId - id for the new group, cannot be null.

      • createGroupQuery

        public org.activiti.engine.identity.GroupQuery createGroupQuery()
        Creates a GroupQuery thats allows to programmatically query the groups.
        Specified by:
        createGroupQuery in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService

      • saveGroup

        public void saveGroup(org.activiti.engine.identity.Group group)
        Saves the group. If the group already existed, the group is updated.
        Specified by:
        saveGroup in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService
        Parameters:
        group - group to save. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - when a group with the same name already exists.

      • deleteGroup

        public void deleteGroup(String groupId)
        Deletes the group. When no group exists with the given id, this operation is ignored.
        Specified by:
        deleteGroup in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService
        Parameters:
        groupId - id of the group that should be deleted, cannot be null.

      • createMembership

        public void createMembership(String userId,
                    String groupId)
        Specified by:
        createMembership in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService
        Parameters:
        userId - the userId, cannot be null.
        groupId - the groupId, cannot be null.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - when the given user or group doesn't exist or when the user is already member of the group.

      • deleteMembership

        public void deleteMembership(String userId,
                    String groupId)
        Delete the membership of the user in the group. When the group or user don't exist or when the user is not a member of the group, this operation is ignored.
        Specified by:
        deleteMembership in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's id, cannot be null.
        groupId - the group's id, cannot be null.

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(String userId,
                    String password)
        Checks if the password is valid for the given user. Arguments userId and password are nullsafe.
        Specified by:
        checkPassword in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService

      • setAuthenticatedUserId

        public void setAuthenticatedUserId(String authenticatedUserId)
        Passes the authenticated user id for this particular thread. All service method (from any service) invocations done by the same thread will have access to this authenticatedUserId.
        Specified by:
        setAuthenticatedUserId in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService

      • setUserPicture

        public void setUserPicture(String userId,
                  org.activiti.engine.identity.Picture picture)
        Sets the picture for a given user.
        Specified by:
        setUserPicture in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService
        Parameters:
        picture - can be null to delete the picture.
        Throws:
        org.activiti.engine.ActivitiException - if the user doesn't exist.

      • getUserPicture

        public org.activiti.engine.identity.Picture getUserPicture(String userId)
        Retrieves the picture for a given user.
        Specified by:
        getUserPicture in interface org.activiti.engine.IdentityService
        Throws:
        org.activiti.engine.ActivitiException - if the user doesn't exist.
